mapper.select: SELECT r_img1.BIZ_ID biz_id, r_img1.R_IMG r_img FROM ROOM_IMG r_img1, ( SELECT room_img1.BIZ_ID biz_id, room_img2.R_ID r_id, MIN(room_img1.R_IMG_ID) R_IMG_ID FROM ROOM_IMG room_img1, ( SELECT BIZ_ID, MIN(R_ID) R_ID FROM ROOM_IMG GROUP BY BIZ_ID ) room_img2 WHERE room_img1.BIZ_ID = room_img2.BIZ_ID AND room_img1.R_ID = room_img2.R_ID GROUP BY room_img1.BIZ_ID, room_img2.R_ID ) r_img2 WHERE r_img1.BIZ_ID = r_img2.biz_id AND r_img1.R_ID = r_img2.r_id AND r_img1.R_IMG_ID = r_img2.R_IMG_ID

SELECT r_img1.BIZ_ID biz_id, r_img1.R_IMG r_img, z.zzim_status FROM ROOM_IMG r_img1, zzim z, ( SELECT room_img1.BIZ_ID biz_id, room_img2.R_ID r_id, MIN(room_img1.R_IMG_ID) R_IMG_ID FROM ROOM_IMG room_img1, ( SELECT BIZ_ID, MIN(R_ID) R_ID FROM ROOM_IMG GROUP BY BIZ_ID ) room_img2 WHERE room_img1.BIZ_ID = room_img2.BIZ_ID AND room_img1.R_ID = room_img2.R_ID GROUP BY room_img1.BIZ_ID, room_img2.R_ID ) r_img2 WHERE r_img1.BIZ_ID = r_img2.biz_id AND r_img1.R_ID = r_img2.r_id AND r_img1.R_IMG_ID = r_img2.R_IMG_ID AND r_img1.biz_id = z.biz_id and z.zzim_status = 'Y' and z.user_id = #{user_id}
